modName: Lanfael by Vincent Dolan and Standalone09
summary: This mod add's a new Sword called Lanfael with scabbard and 1handed+2handed Version´s to your Game.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Garamond][size=5][b][center][color=#ff0000]CREDITS TO VINCENT DOLAN FOR THE ORIGINAL DESIGN[/color]
[color=#ff0000]LINK TO HIS PROFILE: https://sbg-sword-forum.forums.net/user/5258[/color]
[color=#ff0000]LINK TO HIS GALLERY: https://sbg-sword-forum.forums.net/thread/40250[/color]

[color=#1e84cc]Lanfael 2.0 Released which contains everything that should´ve been there in the first place... DSR compatibility, Blood textures... and more 
Thanks to [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/2409532/?]isaneplumber[/url][/u] who basically updated it single-handedly you are Awesome!!! =)[/color]

[youtube]1IB0kuRmqFA[/youtube]
[youtube]TFMcu0nvURE[/youtube]
[youtube]QJms9O3Bt5A[/youtube][/center]

[center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgioc/divider.png[/img][/center][color=#f4f4f4]
Description:[/color][/b][/size][/font]

This mod add's a new Sword called Lanfael with scabbard and 1handed+2handed Version´s to your Game.

....Now It´s been a while since i uploaded a proper Weapon mod to the nexus and since im always trying to improve i listened to YOU guys and found out that you actually dont enjoy "obtain this weapon by crafting" type mods compared to "go on an epic adventure to obtain this awesome sauce weapon" mods who would´ve thought...., therefore i decided to finally learn how to create some sweet Quests for my Weapons!

Please note that i never ever touched the creation kit other then to implement my Weapons via crafting method, thats why it will obviously take me a lot of trial and error to make good quests.

With that in mind i hope you enjoy playing my mod as much as i enjoyed making it Have fun! :)

oh and i guess you wanna know where to find that thing...

The Sword´s are in Possesion of some Angry Dude who was last seen heading out of Riverwood towards those Standing Stone thingy´s......

[font=Garamond][size=5][b]Install:[/b][/size][/font]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your Skyrim Data folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Lanfael.esp

[font=Garamond][size=5][b]Uninstall:[/b][/size][/font]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod

[font=Arial][size=4][b]Changelog:[/b][/size][/font]

Lanfael 2.0

- Blood stains
- Two-Handed version with Scabbard.
- Cleaned meshes from unnecessary records in the header. (BSFadeNode -> Children)
- Now the mod has only two meshes one-handed (Lanfael.nif) and two-handed (Lanfael2h.nif)
- and DSR patch
- Meshes and Textures packed in BSA
- Installer (compatybile with WryeBash and Nexus Mod Manager) allows to choose all the options.



[center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgioc/divider.png[/img][/center]





Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: Vincent Dolan and Standalone09
